devices_included: Tangibles; Tabletop, large horizontal display; Whiteboard, large vertical display
use_cases_desc: The presented scenario is very generic and focusses on the construction of complex queries for big data.
contribution_desc: This paper contributes a vocabulary of user-defined gestures for gestural interaction with active tangibles (in connection with an interactive screen vertical/horizontal). The interactions were elicited in a gesture elicitation study with 19 participants where participants were asked to define gestures for eight different commands (e.g., select an item from a list or display information from an active tangible on the interactive screen).
toolkits: Sifteo 1.0 C#; Microsoft Surface SDK 2.0 C#
tracking_tech: Markerless IR Tracking; Optical; Marker-based IR Tracking; Fiducials
